article_title: Morning Memo: EPA rules draw ire of Republicans, McCrory adminstration
article_text: Under the Dome is your inside source on North Carolina politics and government and has been a regular feature in The N&O since 1934. Check here for the latest on state and federal government, political advocacy and upcoming elections. This blog is maintained by the N&O politics staff.
